scripts.start_qa_linux: npm run report:clean && export NODE_ENV=e2e &&cucumber-js features -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --runInBand
scripts.start_qa_windows: npm run report:clean && set NODE_ENV=e2e2&& cucumber-js ./features/aswPendingStatus.feature -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.start: npm run report:clean && cucumber-js features -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.start:parallel: npm run report:clean && cucumber-js features -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --parallel
scripts.tags_sit: npm run report:clean && set NODE_ENV=e2e&& cucumber-js -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
scripts.tags_sit_jenkins: npm run report:clean && export NODE_ENV=e2e&& cucumber-js -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
scripts.tags_sit_asw: npm run report:clean && set NODE_ENV=e2e&& cucumber-js ./features/asw-dss-e2e/*.feature -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
scripts.tags_local: npm run report:clean && set NODE_ENV=local&& cucumber-js -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
scripts.tags_sit_serv: npm run report:clean && NODE_ENV=e2e2 cucumber-js -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
scripts.tags_mock_jenkins: npm run report:clean && export NODE_ENV=mock&& cucumber-js -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
scripts.tags_mock: npm run report:clean && set NODE_ENV=mock&& cucumber-js -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json --tags
